text: are rss/blog emails not possible with the d&d email editor?
<@U3T21PDBK> they are, when you click "Create Email" you should be given a choice in the initial modal to make a new blog/rss email

There's a small caveat to it which is if you're creating an email for a HS blog, and there's already an existing "classic" email for that blog you'll need to delete it first before creating a new one with the d&d editor. We don't have the ability to convert them yet, but we're working on it

ahhhh… that small caveat was what got me. Thanks for the heads up. Just a heads up, when searching on hs knowledge base I couldn’t find anything on d&d email and rss. Not sure if I’m just missing it or if it doesn’t exist
